Detailed Description

The ComboTabBar class is mixed of a pinned tabbar and a normal scrollable tabbar.

It has a horizontal layout containing: m_leftContainer | m_pinnedTabBarWidget | m_mainTabBarWidget | m_rightContainer

  • Left/Right Containers: Use addCornerWidget() to add widget to m_leftContainer or m_rightContainer
  • Pinned/Main TabBarWidgets: They are of type TabBarScrollWidget, and they add scrollbar to QTabBar

Member Enumeration Documentation

used by comboTabBarPixelMetric()

Enumerator:
ExtraReservedWidth 

e.g.: reserved space for "add tab" and "list tab" buttons

virtual QSize ComboTabBar::tabSizeHint ( int  index,
bool  fast = false 
) const [protected, virtual]

Notice: Use "fast = true" when all pinned tabs have the same size, and also all normal tabs have the same size.
